thread.title: Kate Garraway admits trying two-week sex challenge with husband - but it didn't go exactly to plan
thread.title_full: Kate Garraway admits trying two-week sex challenge with husband - but it didn't go exactly to plan

author: Lara Martin
title: Kate Garraway admits trying two-week sex challenge with husband - but it didn't go exactly to plan
text:
Kate Garraway reveals she snogged giraffe on Kenyan trip Share this video Watch Next 
A blurb on Amazon explains the memoir as Kate’s thoughts and questions on life as she’s about to turn 50 - including what happens to sex lives after the menopause, pension worries, and completing a bucket list. 
“In this revealing exploration of ageing, Kate tackles the biggest issues women in their supposed 'prime' face and searches for answers on their behalf, by drawing on her own experiences and those of others, consulting experts and challenging herself more than she's ever done so before,” it says. 
“Written with all of the natural warmth and humour she's known for, it's a candid look at what it really means to be a modern older woman and why each and every one should be celebrated... big knickers and all!” Kate's new book tackles ageing (Photo: Rex Features) 
Meanwhile, Kate recently admitted on Good Morning Britain the secret to doing outdoor broadcasts: heated knickers. 
Talking about Game of Thrones actress Sophie Turner, Richard Arnold the Entertainment Editor revealed that she was wearing “heated pads” on the small of her back. 
“I’ve got those!” Kate exclaimed. “I have underwear, heated knickers.” Kate pictured at the BAFTA TV Awards 2016 (Photo: Rex) 
And the 49-year-old TV presenter admitted that she wore her heated underwear when reporting on Donald Trump’s inauguration in Washington last month. 
“I wore them in Washington. Honestly they’re like this heated underwear, big pants with heated pads in,” she said. 
Realising that she’d just told the nation about her secret knickers, Kate added sheepishly: “Which I wasn’t going to tell everyone, as the producer just rightly reminded me.” Like us on Facebook
